definition: member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker
"cover" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 14), occurring in 軍|军[jun1], 冠[guan1] etc, known as 禿寶蓋|秃宝盖[tu1 bao3 gai4] or 平寶蓋|平宝盖[ping2 bao3 gai4]
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159
bamboo or wooden spear/Kangxi radical 79, occurring in 段, 毅, 殺 etc

sentences.english: The directional signal switch is installed just below the hub of the steering wheel.
sentences.chinese: 转向开关就安装在转向柱毂的下面。

sentences.english: This paper presents s combined inlaid clutch disc hub, its structural design and manufacturing process.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了压嵌式离合器花键盘毂的结构设计及制造方法。

sentences.english: Thirty spokes converge on a hub
sentences.chinese: 三十辐共一毂，当其无，有车之用。

sentences.english: Remember that hub cap from the truck?
sentences.chinese: 还记得卡车上的毂盖吗？

sentences.english: One technician proposes installing a hub.
sentences.chinese: 一个技术人员计划安装一个毂。

sentences.english: The connecting hub comprises a connector at one end of the hub rod.
sentences.chinese: 连接毂包括在毂柱一端的连接头。

sentences.english: The hosts are detecting the default gateway configured on the hub.
sentences.chinese: 主人正在发现在毂上被配置的内定出入口。

sentences.english: A hub reduces the number of collisions on a LAN.
sentences.chinese: 一个毂减少一个区域网络上的碰撞数字。

definition: to draw a bow to the full/the range of a bow and arrow/old variant of 夠|够[gou4], enough
ancient vehicle made of wood and bamboo/CL:輛|辆[liang4]
tube/cylinder/to encase in sth cylindrical (such as hands in sleeves etc)
sack/tube open at both ends/(onom.) footsteps
outside horses of a team of 4
